description.value:
Your blood flows with tetrodotoxin or a similar toxin, poisoning enemies who dare to bite you.

Creatures that damage you with an attack using their mouths (such as a jaws or fang Strike) must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26] saving throw.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1}.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage and is sickened 1.

Critical Failure The creature takes @Damage[4d6[poison]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2}.
